content:
<script>
  var Dpr = 1,
    uAgent = window.navigator.userAgent;
  var isIOS = uAgent.match(/iphone/i);
  if (window.devicePixelRatio) {
    Dpr = window.devicePixelRatio;
  } else {
    Dpr = isIOS ? (wWidth > 818 ? 3 : wWidth > 480 ? 2 : 1) : 1;
  }
  document.querySelector("html").setAttribute("data-dpr", Dpr);
</script>

function t() {
            function e(e) { var t = c.getRootFontSize(document.body.clientWidth); document.querySelector("html").style.fontSize = t + "px" } e(), window.addEventListener("resize", e),
              window.addEventListener("orientationchange", e)
          }
